Comments
September 6, 2020
ArkhamInquirer
I disagree with the 100 point assessment, he'd be busted at that point value. That being said, I do agree he's a bit overcosted at 125. Maybe 120, or 115 instead, but no lower than that. He's got a long dial full of reducers, solid damage output on virtually any click, and really solid support powers. Plus, he's a wildcard and a stealth buster with flight and indom. This guy has a lot going for him, I'm just not convinced it's worth almost half your build total in Modern 300.
September 5, 2020
Dribs
I don't feel these stats and the damage special warrant 125pts. Maybe 100pt. I've come to accept we'll never get a great Iron Patriot.
